reviewText:
The impossible pet run"Mindless running is a clone of "The impossible game". Instead of a jumping square you have squared cute animals that run through a sprite landscape. For a quick reactions game and just the story mode the mechanics are OK. But in endless mode you die trying to reach the 10k points.

Reasons:
1. Game runs laggy as hell
2. Newly in endless mode introduced double size spikes
3. Sloppy hitboxes - sometimes you die before even touching the spikes or when you are already on the platform above or only close by some water
4. Spike sequences become unfair at 8k points

The main problem is like in every kind of this game type: The controls are way too rudimentary. Means you just can control the start of your jump but no faster going down or in-flight adjustments possible. So if you try to ascend spiked stairs every jump must be fitting perfectly or you'll explode immediately. Another bad are the sometimes low exposed spikes like in yellow desert brown spikes. 2/8 chooseable characters are completly useless. Turtle & Dolphin cannot jump over long gaps because of slowness."

reviewText:
Yes it's hard, but not because you just suck at it but because it feels rigged for failure.
You have to press the space bar to jump over spikes which are either vertical or horizontal and 9 times out of 10 you will die even though you didn't touch the spike. This is why this game gets a thumbs down. It's not good hard, it's stupid hard.
The other complaint I have is that with some maps it's difficult to see the actual spikes because they are almost the same colour as everything else.
I guess if you really hate yourself you could give this a go?
